description: Details of enhanced sound insulation pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 231870FUL dated 12/07/2023 for: Conversion of existing dwellinghouse into 2 self-contained flats and provision of associated cycle and bin storage; single storey rear extension; first floor rear extension.
decision_conditions: The submitted details of enhanced sound insulation pursuant to condition 8 of planning permission ref: 231870FUL dated 12/07/2023, are deemed to be unsatisfactory and do not meet the requirements of the condition. The proposal would therefore fail to comply with policies 1.1 and 1.2 of the Ealing Development (Core) Strategy (2012), policies 7A & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D6 & D14 of the London Plan (2021), Ealing SPG10 and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
